page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: Biography of a farmer He gets up at 6.45a.m. He then speaks to his men and tells them what jobs to do for the day. After that he goes to his office to deal with the mail. Breakfast is at 7.15.a.m. Most of the day is spent speaking to travellers such as seed merchants or fertilizer representatives. He goes round the fields with these travellers finding out what is best for the crops. 12 noon is lunch and 5.p.m. is tea and if the weather is good he will help work till dark. Our farmer spends a lot of time at meetings as he is a committee member of the National Farmers'Union.
